text:
FLSA
§ 13(d) provides an exemption from FLSA §§ 6, 7, and 12 for homeworkers engaged
in the making of wreaths composed principally of natural holly, pine, cedar, or
other evergreens (include the harvesting of the evergreens or other forest
products used in making such wreaths) (see FOH Chapter 25).
html: FLSA § 13(d) provides an exemption from FLSA §§ 6, 7, and 12 for homeworkers engaged in the making of wreaths composed principally of natural holly, pine, cedar, or other evergreens (include the harvesting of the evergreens or other forest products used in making such wreaths) (see FOH Chapter 25).
